div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 368px; height: 1px; padding-top: 60px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. split. Train set: n = 82
82 = (full train set n - (n_splits * between_split_lag))
